Vector and System Memory Options

Vector memory placement and system memory options.

  • System Memories
    System RAM and ROM
  • Automatically Position Vectors
  • Vector Layout Style
  • Relocatable Vectors option
  • Alternate Static Vector Base Address
    Alternate address for the static vectors (reset and optionally memory errors) which will be used if the appropriate pin is asserted.
  • External Reset Vector
  • Default Dynamic Vector Group Vector Base
  • Static Vectors
  • Dynamic Vectors
